DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether a bedside portable endoscopy is effective in identifying the esophageal foreign body in the emergency room.
DOC.brief_title: A Bedside Portable Endoscopy for the Esophageal Foreign Body
DOC.criteria: Patients who visit the emergency room due to apparent foreign body in esophagus Patients unable to insert a portable endoscopy through the nasal cavity Patients unable to undergo conventional esophagogastroduodenoscopy for a gold standard examination
